title: 服务器打不开

replies.author: 宇宙最凶
replies.txt_content:
at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadConfiguration(YamlConfiguration.java:185)
楼主你有yml有毛病
把服务器根目录下的yml全部删除后开服试试

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 有一个mod是1.7.2的版本，1.7.10服务器用这个干嘛
